channel.title: NPR Topics: National
channel.description: NPR coverage of national news, U.S. politics, elections, business, arts, culture, health and science, and technology. Subscribe to the NPR Nation RSS feed.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: In pictures: Winter storm slams the east coast
item.description: Photos of cities in Connecticut, New York, New Jersey and Massachusetts as they cope with a powerful winter storm.
item.content:encoded:
Photos of cities in Connecticut, New York, New Jersey and Massachusetts as they cope with a powerful winter storm.

(Image credit: Mark Mirko)
item.dc:creator: Danielle A. Scruggs

item.title: Volunteers help make up the difference after national parks service cuts
item.description: Great Smoky Mountains National Park is the busiest National park in the U.S., but with the park service cutting nearly a quarter of all positions last year, volunteers have made up the difference.
item.content:encoded: Great Smoky Mountains National Park is the busiest National park in the U.S., but with the park service cutting nearly a quarter of all positions last year, volunteers have made up the difference.
item.dc:creator: Matt Ozug

item.title: A new lawsuit alleges DHS illegally tracked and intimidated observers
item.description: Observers watching federal immigration enforcement in Maine who were told by agents they were "domestic terrorists" and would be added to a "database" or "watchlist" are now part of a new federal class action lawsuit.
item.content:encoded:
Observers watching federal immigration enforcement in Maine who were told by agents they were "domestic terrorists" and would be added to a "database" or "watchlist" are now part of a new federal class action lawsuit.

(Image credit: Stephen Maturen)
item.dc:creator: Jude Joffe-Block

item.title: A powerful winter storm is roiling travel across the northeastern U.S.
item.description: Forecasters called travel conditions "extremely treacherous" and "nearly impossible" in areas hit hardest by the storm, and air and train traffic is at a standstill in many parts of the region.
item.content:encoded:
Forecasters called travel conditions "extremely treacherous" and "nearly impossible" in areas hit hardest by the storm, and air and train traffic is at a standstill in many parts of the region.

(Image credit: Seth Wenig)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: What NPR reporters will remember most about these Winter Olympics
item.description: NPR's reporters on the ground in Italy reflect on a far-flung, jam-packed Winter Olympics.
item.content:encoded:
NPR's reporters on the ground in Italy reflect on a far-flung, jam-packed Winter Olympics.

(Image credit: Maja Hitij)
item.dc:creator: Rachel Treisman

item.title: Lawyer in SCOTUS case against Trump's tariffs says his clients want a refund
item.description: Neal Katyal, one of the lawyers who defended U.S. businesses in the SCOTUS case against Trump's tariffs, argues that the federal government must refund them with interest.
item.content:encoded:
Neal Katyal, one of the lawyers who defended U.S. businesses in the SCOTUS case against Trump's tariffs, argues that the federal government must refund them with interest.

(Image credit: Drew Angerer/Getty Images)
item.dc:creator: Steve Inskeep

item.title: Armed man shot and killed at Mar-a-Lago Sunday
item.description: An armed man was shot and killed at Mar-a-Lago on Sunday. President Trump was in Washington, D.C., at the time.
item.content:encoded: An armed man was shot and killed at Mar-a-Lago on Sunday. President Trump was in Washington, D.C., at the time.
item.dc:creator: Luke Garrett

item.title: Fear of Flying clinic helps anxious travelers take off
item.description: Aerophobia, or the fear of flying, affects tens of millions of Americans. One Bay Area program has been helping uneasy travelers fly the friendly skies for 50 years.
item.content:encoded: Aerophobia, or the fear of flying, affects tens of millions of Americans. One Bay Area program has been helping uneasy travelers fly the friendly skies for 50 years.
item.dc:creator: Evan Roberts

item.title: Vigil held to remember the 9 skiers killed in California avalanche
item.description: Members of the California community closest to Castle Peak Mountain, where an avalanche killed nine backcountry skiers, gathered for a vigil to remember the lives lost.
item.content:encoded: Members of the California community closest to Castle Peak Mountain, where an avalanche killed nine backcountry skiers, gathered for a vigil to remember the lives lost.
item.dc:creator: Kat Fulwider

item.title: After SCOTUS deals blow to Trump's tariffs, businesses wonder if refunds are coming
item.description: Following a Supreme Court ruling that rejected about half of President Trump's tariffs, U.S. businesses question whether refunds are coming their way.
item.content:encoded: Following a Supreme Court ruling that rejected about half of President Trump's tariffs, U.S. businesses question whether refunds are coming their way.
item.dc:creator: Alina Selyukh
